result.eng: He who sows in the spring, he will reap in the autumn.
result.ga: An té a chuireann san earrach bainfidh sé san fhómhar
result.orig: An té a chuireann san earrach bainfidh sé san fhómhar
result.html: An té a chuireann san earrach bainfidh sé san fhómharHe who sows in the spring, he will reap in the autumn.
result.ponchtml: An té a ċuireann san earraċ bainfiḋ sé san ḟóṁarHe who sows in the spring, he will reap in the autumn.

result.eng: Anybody looking for a job in Raidió na Gaeltachta should speak good Irish.
result.ga: Ba cheart Gaeilge mhaith a bheith ag an té atá ag iarraidh poist ar Raidió na Gaeltachta
result.orig: Ba cheart Gaeilge mhaith a bheith ag an té atá ag iarraidh poist ar Raidió na Gaeltachta
result.html: Ba cheart Gaeilge mhaith a bheith ag an té atá ag iarraidh poist ar Raidió na GaeltachtaAnybody looking for a job in Raidió na Gaeltachta should speak good Irish.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart Gaeilge ṁaiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag an té atá ag iarraiḋ poist ar Raidió na GaeltaċtaAnybody looking for a job in Raidió na Gaeltachta should speak good Irish.

result.eng: Anybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht
result.orig: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht

result.eng: Copyright is usually held by whoever created the work.
result.ga: Bíonn an cóipcheart leis an té a chum
result.orig: Bíonn an cóipcheart leis an té a chum
result.html: Bíonn an cóipcheart leis an té a chumCopyright is usually held by whoever created the work.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an cóipċeart leis an té a ċumCopyright is usually held by whoever created the work.

result.eng: Voters prefer candidates who already have power.
result.ga: Is fearr le vótóirí an té a bhíos i seilbh na cumhachta
result.orig: Is fearr le vótóirí an té a bhíos i seilbh na cumhachta
result.html: Is fearr le vótóirí an té a bhíos i seilbh na cumhachtaVoters prefer candidates who already have power.
result.ponchtml: Is fearr le vótóirí an té a ḃíos i seilḃ na cuṁaċtaVoters prefer candidates who already have power.

result.eng: There is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.
result.ga: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinín
result.orig: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinín
result.html: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinínThere is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.
result.ponchtml: Níl dada le gnóṫú ar a ḃeiṫ easuṁal don té a ḃfuil tú ina ṁuinínThere is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.
